title: About

content:
<!DOCTYPE html>My Photography GalleryMy PhotographyHey there! Welcome to my photography collection. Here you'll find an arbitrary selection of photos taken by me.These works are included because I consider them interesting, nice, or just worth showing‚Äînot necessarilytechnically perfect or my best.
Disclaimer: Images have been scaled and compressed! Feel free to contact me for higher-res and/or RAW files ifyou need them.
Images below are shared under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license.
I love capturing moments from various locations, and each photo has its own story. Whether it's a bustlingcityscape or a serene landscape, my goal is to evoke emotions and share my perspective with you.
← PreviousPage 1Next →×
summary:
My Photography

Hey there! Welcome to my photography collection. Here you'll find an arbitrary selection of photos taken by me. These works are included because I consider them interesting, nice, or just worth showing‚Äînot necessarily technically perfect or my best.

content:
<!DOCTYPE html>Project GalleryProjects PortfolioHey there! Here are some of my projects. I've worked on many more throughout my career, but I don't have copies of all of them. Some projects have been handed over, are offline, or I've even forgotten a few! But these examples should give you a taste of what I can do.
Feel free to dive in and explore my work. If you have any questions or want to know more about my other projects, just reach out. Let's build something amazing together!
← PreviousPage 1Next →
summary:
Projects Portfolio

Hey there! Here are some of my projects. I've worked on many more throughout my career, but I don't have copies of all of them. Some projects have been handed over, are offline, or I've even forgotten a few! But these examples should give you a taste of what I can do.
